comments.raw_text:
The Feedreader/ feedreading component isn't covered by any unit tests. 

We should start adding new unit tests to make sure we start covering the component and after a while.

This is a follow up bug for  bug 689950.
comments.creator: ludovic@hirlimann.net
comments.author: ludovic@hirlimann.net
